ModMetaData.name: Advanced Transport Pods
ModMetaData.author: crewd
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a larger version of the transport pod to the game.
Maximum load capacity for these pods have been increased to 275kg. Due to the immense size of this monstrosity a small amount of plasteel is required for the construction. However, it still needs only one component, as the control circuitry has largely remained identical to its smaller predecessor.
